籤詩版本二:
Isibonelo, amabanga esithathu, esine, nelesihlanu enyangeni yokuqala awatholakali, uhhafu awukho, uhhafu ukhona, futhi awuphelele.
Ilinde isidlo saphakathi kwamabili ngosuku lweshumi nanhlanu lonyaka, yonke into ikhanya futhi igcwele
詩意:
Kule hexagram, inyanga ayikho kodwa ayigcwele.
Yiba nesineke kukho konke.
解曰: Hlala unomphela futhi ulinde. Njengenyanga yokuqala yenyanga. Ilinde isikhathi sokujikeleza. Akukho okubi.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULi Yuan ukhuphuke esihlalweni
Eminyakeni yokugcina yoBukhosi BamaSui, uMbusi uYang Wobukhosi BamaSui wayekhohlakele futhi engahlelekile, ejabulisa yonke indawo, ebangela ukucasuka phakathi kwabantu futhi ehlukanisa umbuso phakathi kwamaqhawe.
Ngo-618 AD, u-Yu Wenhuaji, uSima Dekan, uPei Qantong nabanye baqala ukuvukela umbuso ukuze babulale uMbusi uYang weSui Dynasty futhi bamemezela uYang Hao njengombusi.
Ngokushesha u-Yu Wenhuaji wabulala uQin Wanghao futhi wazibiza ngokuthi uMbusi uXu, esungula izwe elithi Xu.
Ngonyaka olandelayo, wabhujiswa ngokuhlanganyela ujenene waseTang uLi Shentong kanye nenkosi yaseXia uDou Jiande.
Ngemva kokuba isifunda saseCentral Plains sizwe ngokufa koMbusi uYang, unogada waseLuoyang u-Wang Shichong wasekela iNkosi u-Dong yaseYue njengombusi, okungukuthi, uMbusi u-Ai waseSui Dynasty.
Ngalesi sikhathi, u-Li Yuan wehlisa u-Yang You, wazibiza ngombusi e-Taiyuan, futhi washintsha igama lezwe laba yi-Tang. Lena indawo ka-Tang Gaozu.
聖意: Umndeni nendlu uzifisela inhlanhla ehlobo nasekwindla, funa ingcebo, gcina amadili, linda isikhathi, umshado uphuzile, uLiujia uzala intombazane, abahamba ngezinyawo bavinjiwe, izikelemu zizinzile, imfuyo izinzile, it kunzima ukuthola abantu, amacala omphakathi kanye nokufuduka kuyaqina, impahla elahlekile inzima, ukugula kunzima ukumisa, ukuthumela ethuneni lasezintabeni, futhi kushintshe.
